shots.description: Establishing shot of Nick Carraway's apartment, dimly lit by the evening light. Camera slowly pans across the room, lingering on small details that hint at his character and state of mind.
shots.dialogue: "Whenever you feel like criticizing anyone, just remember that all the people in this world haven't had the advantages that you've had."

shots.description: Close-up of Nick's face, his eyes distant and pensive as he recalls his father's advice. The lighting is soft, casting shadows that accentuate the contemplative expression on his face.
A shot of Nick's hands, holding a worn-out book, his fingers tracing the embossed title: 'The Great Gatsby.' The camera lingers on the book, hinting at the significance of the story to come.

newCharacters.name: Nick Carraway
newCharacters.description: The narrator and protagonist, a young man from the Midwest who moves to New York and becomes entangled in the lives of the wealthy elite.
